DOC.detailed_description: A phase 1 , open-label , single centre study ass pharmacokinetics , Safety tolerability different form , formulation dos AZD9496 healthy volunteer . This fixed sequence study 5-sequential treatment period . Each subject receive 5 single dos AZD9496 different form , formulation dos . - Treatment period one ass AZD9496 Variant A : 100mg . - Treatment period two ass AZD9496 Reference form : 100mg . - Treatment period 3 ass one AZD9496 Variants , B , C D : 100mg . - Treatment period 4 ass one AZD9496 Variants , B , C D : 100mg . - Treatment period 5 ass one AZD9496 Variants A , B , C D : *300mg . *Based review pharmacokinetic safety result Treatment Periods 1 , 3 4 , low dose 200 mg may administer Treatment Period 5 .
